## RouterLinkProps interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface RouterLinkProps extends RouterLinkOptions 
```
<b>Extends:</b> RouterLinkOptions

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [activeClass?](./reactivuety.routerlinkprops.activeclass.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Class to apply when the link is active |
|  [ariaCurrentValue?](./reactivuety.routerlinkprops.ariacurrentvalue.md) | 'page' \| 'step' \| 'location' \| 'date' \| 'time' \| 'true' \| 'false' | <i>(Optional)</i> Value passed to the attribute <code>aria-current</code> when the link is exact active. Defaults to "page" |
|  [className?](./reactivuety.routerlinkprops.classname.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> |
|  [custom?](./reactivuety.routerlinkprops.custom.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Whether RouterLink should not wrap its content in an <code>a</code> tag. Useful when using <code>v-slot</code> to create a custom RouterLink |
|  [exactActiveClass?](./reactivuety.routerlinkprops.exactactiveclass.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Class to apply when the link is exact active |
|  [style?](./reactivuety.routerlinkprops.style.md) | React.CSSProperties | <i>(Optional)</i> |
